attributes.name: Style
attributes.summary:
### Visual DNA
Primary-color geometry, asymmetrical tension, and modular grid systems that echo Bauhaus workshop posters and exhibition catalogs.

### Inspirations
- Bauhaus archives
- Google Bauhaus
- Harvard Art Museums

Lay out editorial hero bands, pricing cards, and interactive canvases with bold sans typography, offset accent bars, and precise negative space.

cardInfo.notes: Pair with interface cards that can showcase modular grids, hero banners, and motion samples using the theme variables.
cardInfo.title: Bauhaus Geometric Style Reference
cardInfo.description: Theme bundle featuring a Bauhaus-inspired Style Reference, paired Brand Guide, and reusable CSS variable set.
